Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-30161 affecting package qtbase for versions less than 6.6.3-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-30161 affecting package qtbase for versions less than 6.6.3-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package qtbase is earlier than 6.6.3-2, affected by CVE-2024-30161
